com.markussecundus.forms.elements

Interface Element

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DrawableElem<Rend,Pos>, UberDrawable<Rend,Pos>, UberElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicAbstractDrawableElem, BasicAbstractLayout, BasicGridLayout, BasicLabel, BasicLinearLayout, DummyDrawableElem, ImageIcon, ImageIcon.Plain, PrimitivePositionalLayout, Slider, Slider.Basic
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Element
    The bare minimal Element of the Form interface. Can only be updated, additional functionality is required for it to be drawn on the screen - see DrawableElem As is can be used to contain pieces of UI logic, that are to be performed on every update.
    Author:
    MarkusSecundus

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void update(float delta, int frameId)
      Called each frame of the game loop.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(float delta,
            int frameId)
        Called each frame of the game loop.
        Parameters:
        delta - the time in milliseconds elapsed from the last call of update
        frameId - the identifier of the current frame - can be used to detect skipped frames or update being called multiple times in one frame - incremented by 1 on each frame - does not uniquely define the frame, asi the number of frames in one game run is unlimited, unlike the capacity of int type
